settings.heading: When do I receive my subscription coffee?
settings.row_content:
Your first subscription goes out the next working day after you started your subscription.

The only exception is our Masterpiece subscription. This one we send out on the first Wednesday of each month.

All other subscription are fully flexible and you can change your desired dispatch date via your online portal. You can also pause or skip your subscription at any point.

The time to reach you with your freshly roasted coffee depends on your location and the service that you have chosen. For exact durations visit our shipping policies page.

settings.heading: When are we sending out your subscription coffees?
settings.row_content: We typically take 1 to 3 working days from your order date to ensure freshness before shipping it to you.

settings.heading: Which coffees will I be receiving?
settings.row_content: Our roast team selects the subscriber coffees every month. They are typically our latest releases and often microlots. When you are starting your subscription you can chose between espresso and filter roasts.

settings.heading: I have just signed up for a subscription. When will I receive my coffee?
settings.row_content:
Your first subscription goes out the next working day after you started your subscription.

The only exception is our Masterpiece subscription. This one we send out on the first Wednesday of each month. All other subscription are fully flexible and you can change your desired dispatch date via your online portal.

You can also pause or skip your subscription at any point. The time to reach you with your freshly roasted coffee depends on your location and the service that you have chosen. For exact durations visit our shipping policies page.

settings.heading: What is the price advantage compared to single web orders?
settings.row_content:
The price advantages of our subscription vary because we pick different coffees every month and they have different pricing. The average price advantage can be as much as 25% compared to purchasing individual coffees on our website.

The best pricing can be achieved by booking a pre-paid term subscription.
